name: stock
description: Retrieve stock prices and ticker symbols.

functions.name: get_stock_price
functions.description: Get the current stock price using a ticker or company name.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., NVDA). Optional if company_name is provided.

company_name.description: The company name to search for (e.g., NVIDIA). Optional if ticker is provided.

exchange.description: [optional] The stock exchange to use (e.g., NASDAQ, NYSE). Defaults to NASDAQ.

functions.name: get_ticker_from_company
functions.description: Get a ticker symbol by company name.

company_name.description: The full or partial company name (e.g., GameStop).

exchange.description: [optional] The preferred stock exchange to search (e.g., NASDAQ, NYSE). Defaults to NASDAQ.
